Package com.link_intersystems.lang.reflect

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    InvocationArgumentsResolver
    An InvocationArgumentsResolver resolves arguments for a method call.
    Invokable
    An Invokable is an abstraction to all java members, e.g. a Method or a Constructor, that can be invoked.
    ObjectFactory<T>  
    ParameterizedObjectFactory<T,P>  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractInvocationHandler<T>  
    AbstractInvokable
    Implements the adaption for Invokable.asCallable(Object...), Invokable.asRunnable(Object...), Invokable.invoke(Object...)
    AdaptableProxy
    An AdaptableProxy is used to create adapters that route method calls on the adapted interfaces to equivalent methods on the adapted object.
    ArrayType<T>
    Represents an array's component type of type T.
    Class2<T>
    An extension to the Class that encapsulates complex logic like finding an applicable method or constructor and handling generic types.
    Constants<T>
    Convenience class to access constants defined in some class.
    Constructor2<T>
    A Constructor2 is an extension of the standard java Constructor.
    DynamicDelegateProxy<T>
    A DynamicDelegateProxy is a Proxy that delegates calls to it's interface to a selected target object with the same interface.
    FilteredMethodIterator  
    Member2<M extends Member>  
    MemberModifierPredicate
    A Predicate that evaluates Member's modifiers.
    Method2
    Extends a Method by wrapping it and provides sophisticated methods for common Method object based.
    MethodInvokingTransformer
    A MethodInvokingTransformer transforms objects by calling methods on them and returns the method result as the transformed object.
    NullInvocationArgumentsResolver
    An NullInvocationArgumentsResolver returns argument arrays that contain null values for objects and default values for primitive types as defined by Primitives.getDefaultValue(Class).
    Package2
    Provides more features when working with Package objects.
    Parameter
    A description of an Invokables Parameter.
    ReflectFacade  
    SignaturePredicate<T extends Member>
    A predicate that evaluates to true if the object it is evaluates against is a constructor or method and has the same signature as the constructor or method that this SignaturePredicate has been constructed with.
    ThreadLocalProxy  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AccessType
    Access modifiers definition.
    MemberModifierPredicate.Match
    The MemberModifierPredicate.Match type that the MemberModifierPredicate uses.
